trans-unit.source: The path can be either absolute or relative. Absolute paths begin with the directory separator "/" (optionally preceded by a drive specification under Windows). Relative file names begin with a directory name or a file name and specify a path relative to the current directory. An example of an absolute path is the string "/tmp/quartz", a relative path might look like "src/fatlib".
trans-unit.target: 路径可以是绝对路径,也可以是相对路径。绝对路径以目录分隔符"/"开头(在Windows下可选择在前面加上一个驱动器规格)。相对文件名以目录名或文件名开头,并指定一个相对于当前目录的路径。绝对路径的一个例子是字符串"/tmp/quartz",相对路径可能是 "src/fatlib"。

trans-unit.source: The path for a directory can also be changed with the cd() and cdUp() functions, both of which operate like familiar shell commands. When cd() is called with the name of an existing directory, the QDir object changes directory so that it represents that directory instead. The cdUp() function changes the directory of the QDir object so that it refers to its parent directory; i.e. cd("..") is equivalent to cdUp().
trans-unit.target: 目录的路径也可以使用cd（）和cdUp（）函数进行更改，这两个函数的作用类似于熟悉的Shell命令。当使用现有目录的名称调用cd（）时，QDir对象将更改目录，以使其代替该目录。所述CDUP（）函数改变的目录的QDir对象，以便它是指它的父目录; 即cd（“ ..”）等效于cdUp（）。

trans-unit.source: The path for a directory can also be changed with the cd() and cdUp() functions, both of which operate like familiar shell commands. When cd() is called with the name of an existing directory, the QDir object changes directory so that it represents that directory instead. The cdUp() function changes the directory of the QDir object so that it refers to its parent directory; i.e. cd("..") is equivalent to cdUp().
The path formed by concatenating the HOMEDRIVE and HOMEPATH environment variables.

trans-unit.source: The path specified by this variable can contain custom Java classes under src directory. By default, the androiddeployqt tool copies the application template from the Qt for Android installation path into your project's build directory, then it copies the contents of the path specified by this variable on top of that, overwriting any existing files. For instance, you can make a custom AndroidManifest.xml for your application, then place this directly into the directory specified by this variable.
The path to a link icon.

trans-unit.source: The paths for the .ini and .conf files can be changed using setPath(). On Unix, macOS, and iOS the user can override them by setting the XDG_CONFIG_HOME environment variable; see setPath() for details.
trans-unit.target: .ini 和 .conf 文件的路径可以使用setPath（）进行更改。在Unix，macOS和iOS上，用户可以通过设置 XDG_CONFIG_HOME 环境变量来覆盖它们。有关详细信息，请参见setPath（）。

trans-unit.source: The paths for the .ini and .conf files can be changed using setPath(). On Unix, macOS, and iOS the user can override them by setting the XDG_CONFIG_HOME environment variable; see setPath() for details.

The paths that qmake searches for libraries and the specific libraries to link against can be added to the list of values in the LIBS variable. You can specify the paths to the libraries or use the Unix-style notation for specifying libraries and paths.
trans-unit.target: 可以将qmake搜索库的路径以及要链接的特定库添加到LIBS变量的值列表中。您可以指定库的路径，也可以使用Unix样式的符号来指定库和路径。

trans-unit.source: The pattern [a-z is an example of an invalid pattern, since it lacks a closing square bracket.
trans-unit.target: 模式[az是无效模式的一个示例，因为它缺少右方括号。

trans-unit.source: The pattern is a fixed string. This is equivalent to using the RegExp pattern on a string in which all metacharacters are escaped using escape().
trans-unit.target: 模式是固定的字符串。这等效于在字符串上使用RegExp模式，在该字符串中，所有所有元字符都使用escape（）进行了转义。

trans-unit.source: The pattern is a fixed string. This is equivalent to using the RegularExpression pattern on a string in which all metacharacters are escaped using escape(). This is the default.
The pattern is a regular expression as defined by the W3C XML Schema 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 该模式是由W3C XML Schema 1.1规范定义的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern must be specified as an even number of positive entries where the entries 1, 3, 5... are the dashes and 2, 4, 6... are the spaces. For example:
trans-unit.target: 模式必须指定为偶数的正数条目,其中条目1,3,5...是破折号,2,4,6...是空格。例如:1、3、5...是破折号,2、4、6...是空格。

trans-unit.source: The pattern should match against the subject string in a case insensitive way. This option corresponds to the /i modifier in Perl regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该模式应该以不区分大小写的方式与主题字符串进行匹配。这个选项对应于Perl正则表达式中的/i修饰符。

trans-unit.source: The pattern string is matched partially against the subject string. If a partial match is found, then it is recorded, and other matching alternatives are tried as usual. If a complete match is then found, then it's preferred to the partial match; in this case only the complete match is reported. If instead no complete match is found (but only the partial one), then the partial one is reported.
trans-unit.target: 模式字符串与主题字符串进行部分匹配。如果发现了部分匹配,则记录下来,并像往常一样尝试其他匹配选项。如果找到了完全匹配,那么它比部分匹配更受欢迎;在这种情况下,只报告完全匹配。如果没有找到完整的匹配(而只有部分匹配),则报告部分匹配。

trans-unit.source: The pattern string is matched partially against the subject string. If a partial match is found, then matching stops and the partial match is reported. In this case, other matching alternatives (potentially leading to a complete match) are not tried. Moreover, this match type assumes that the subject string only a substring of a larger text, and that (in this text) there are other characters beyond the end of the subject string. This can lead to surprising results; see the discussion in the partial matching section for more details.
trans-unit.target: 模式字符串与主题字符串部分匹配。如果找到部分匹配，则匹配停止，并报告部分匹配。在这种情况下，不会尝试其他匹配替代方法（可能导致完全匹配）。此外，此匹配类型假定主题字符串仅是较大文本的子字符串，并且（在此文本中）主题字符串的末尾还有其他字符。这可能会导致令人惊讶的结果；有关更多详细信息，请参见部分匹配部分中的讨论。

trans-unit.source: The patternRecognitionModes method returns a list of pattern recognition modes, which are supported by the input method. A pattern recognition mode, such as Handwriting , defines the method by which the input method processes the data.
trans-unit.target: patternRecognitionModes方法返回输入方法支持的模式识别模式的列表。模式识别模式（例如Handwriting）定义了输入法处理数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: The payload can be modified by using setData() and the destination address can be set with setDestination().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setData（）修改有效负载，并可以使用setDestination（）设置目标地址。

trans-unit.source: The peak volume of the media's audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 媒体的音频流的峰值音量。

trans-unit.source: The peer certificate is checked automatically during the handshake phase, so this function is normally used to fetch the certificate for display or for connection diagnostic purposes. It contains information about the peer, including its host name, the certificate issuer, and the peer's public key.
trans-unit.target: 在握手阶段会自动检查对等体的证书,所以该功能通常用于获取证书以显示或用于连接诊断。它包含了对等体的信息,包括它的主机名、证书颁发者和对等体的公钥。

trans-unit.source: The peer certificates are set in QSslSocket during the handshake phase, so it is safe to call this function from a slot connected to the sslErrors() signal or the encrypted() signal.
trans-unit.target: 对等证书是在握手阶段在QSslSocket中设置的，因此可以安全地从连接到sslErrors（）信号或加密（）信号的插槽中调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: The peer certificates are set in QSslSocket during the handshake phase, so it is safe to call this function from a slot connected to the sslErrors() signal or the encrypted() signal.
The peer host name can also be used to indicate the expected source address of an incoming connection in the case of QNetworkProxyQuery::UdpSocket or QNetworkProxyQuery::TcpServer query types.
trans-unit.target: 在QNetworkProxyQuery :: UdpSocket或QNetworkProxyQuery :: TcpServer查询类型的情况下，对等主机名也可以用于指示传入连接的预期源地址。

trans-unit.source: The peer port number can also be used to indicate the expected port number of an incoming connection in the case of QNetworkProxyQuery::UdpSocket or QNetworkProxyQuery::TcpServer query types.
trans-unit.target: 在QNetworkProxyQuery :: UdpSocket或QNetworkProxyQuery :: TcpServer查询类型的情况下，对等端口号也可用于指示传入连接的预期端口号。

trans-unit.source: The peer's certificate and its certificate chain will be known by the time sslErrors() is emitted, if it's emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果发出了sslErrors（），则将知道对等方的证书及其证书链。

trans-unit.source: The pen color is specified with
trans-unit.target: 笔的颜色是用

trans-unit.source: The pen is dirty and needs to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 笔很脏,需要更新。

trans-unit.source: The pen is used to draw the item's outline.
trans-unit.target: 用笔画出物品的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: The pen style defines the line type. The brush is used to fill strokes generated with the pen. Use the QBrush class to specify fill styles. The cap style determines the line end caps that can be drawn using QPainter, while the join style describes how joins between two lines are drawn. The pen width can be specified in both integer (width()) and floating point (widthF()) precision. A line width of zero indicates a cosmetic pen. This means that the pen width is always drawn one pixel wide, independent of the transformation set on the painter.
trans-unit.target: 笔样式定义线型。笔刷用于填充笔产生的笔划。使用QBrush类指定填充样式。顶盖样式确定可以使用QPainter绘制的线端盖，而连接样式描述如何绘制两条线之间的连接。笔宽度可以整数（width（））和浮点（widthF（））精度指定。线宽为零表示化妆笔。这意味着笔宽始终绘制为一个像素宽，而与画家设置的变换无关。

trans-unit.source: The pendent to QXmlStreamReader is QXmlStreamWriter, which provides an XML writer with a simple streaming API. QXmlStreamWriter operates on a QIODevice and has specialized functions for all XML tokens or events you want to write, such as writeDTD(), writeCharacters(), writeComment() and so on.
trans-unit.target: 悬垂到QXmlStreamReader是QXmlStreamWriter，它提供了一个简单的流API的XML作家。QXmlStreamWriter在QIODevice上运行，并且具有针对您要编写的所有XML令牌或事件的专门功能，例如writeDTD（），writeCharacters（），writeComment（）等。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the slice compared to the sum of all slices in the series. The actual value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0. Updated automatically once the slice is added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 该片与系列中所有片数之和相比的百分比。实际值的范围是0.0到1.0。一旦切片被添加到系列中,自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The performance benefit is primarily seen when registering application specific types from within the application instead of through a plugin. Using qmlProtectModule allows the engine to skip checking for a plugin when that uri is imported, which can be noticeable with slow file systems.
trans-unit.target: 性能上的优势主要体现在从应用程序内部而不是通过插件注册应用程序特定类型时。使用qmlProtectModule可以让引擎在导入uri时跳过对插件的检查,这在慢速文件系统中是很明显的。

trans-unit.source: The performance of the particle system scales with the number of particles it is maintaining. After prototyping the desired effect, performance can be improved by lowering the particle count. Conversely, if performance is well within the acceptable bounds, you can increase the number of particles until you hit that point (should that improve the effect).
trans-unit.target: 粒子系统的性能随其保持的粒子数量而缩放。在制作出所需效果的原型后,可以通过降低粒子数量来提高性能。相反,如果性能在可接受的范围内,你可以增加粒子的数量,直到达到那个点(应该可以改善效果)。

trans-unit.source: The permission was denied.
trans-unit.target: 该许可被拒绝了。

trans-unit.source: The permission was granted.
trans-unit.target: 该许可已获批准。

trans-unit.source: The phong lighting effect is based on the combination of 3 lighting components ambient, diffuse and specular. The relative strengths of these components are controlled by means of their reflectivity coefficients which are modelled as RGB triplets:
trans-unit.target: PHONG照明效果是基于环境、漫射和镜面三个照明组件的组合。这些成分的相对强度由它们的反射系数来控制,反射系数被模拟成RGB三联体。

trans-unit.source: The phrase may consist of several words. By default, the search engine returns the list of documents that contain all the specified words. The phrase may contain any combination of the logical operators AND, OR, and NOT. The operator must be written in all capital letters, otherwise it will be considered a part of the search phrase.
trans-unit.target: 该短语可能由多个单词组成。默认情况下,搜索引擎会返回包含所有指定单词的文档列表。该短语可以包含逻辑运算符 AND、OR 和 NOT 的任意组合。操作符必须用所有大写字母书写,否则将被视为搜索短语的一部分。

All the data in the series is discarded when it is set to the mapper. When new series is specified the old series is disconnected (but it preserves its data).

trans-unit.source: The pixel contents of a video frame can be mapped to memory using the map() function. While mapped, the video data can accessed using the bits() function, which returns a pointer to a buffer. The total size of this buffer is given by the mappedBytes() function, and the size of each line is given by bytesPerLine(). The return value of the handle() function may also be used to access frame data using the internal buffer's native APIs (for example - an OpenGL texture handle).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用map（）函数将视频帧的像素内容映射到内存。映射后，可以使用bits（）函数访问视频数据，该函数返回一个指向缓冲区的指针。这个缓冲器的总大小由给定mappedBytes（）函数，并且每行的大小由下式给出bytesPerLine（）。handle（）函数的返回值还可用于使用内部缓冲区的本机API（例如-OpenGL纹理句柄）访问帧数据。

trans-unit.source: The pixel formats returned for the QAbstractVideoBuffer::NoHandle type are valid for any buffer that can be mapped in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 为QAbstractVideoBuffer :: NoHandle类型返回的像素格式对于可以以只读模式映射的任何缓冲区均有效。

trans-unit.source: The pixel size of the font info that has been resolved for the current font and fontSizeMode.
trans-unit.target: 当前字体和fontSizeMode已解析的字体信息的像素大小。

trans-unit.source: The pixel values from source and foregroundSource are negated, then multiplied, negated again, and written.
trans-unit.target: 取反source和foregroundSource的像素值，然后相乘，再次取反并写入。

trans-unit.source: The pixels in the destination are cleared (set to 0) independent of the source.
trans-unit.target: 目的地的像素被清除(设置为0),与源无关。

trans-unit.source: The pixels in the destination are cleared (set to fully transparent) independent of the source.
trans-unit.target: 目的地的像素被清除(设置为完全透明),与源无关。

trans-unit.source: The pixels in the destination are set (set to 1) independent of the source.
trans-unit.target: 目的地中的像素被设置为(设置为1),与来源无关。

trans-unit.source: The pixels that an application uses (user space), subject to scaling by the operating system or Qt.
The pixmap becomes monochrome. If necessary, it is dithered using the chosen dithering algorithm.

trans-unit.source: The pixmap depth is also called bits per pixel (bpp) or bit planes of a pixmap. A null pixmap has depth 0.

trans-unit.source: The pixmap is drawn at the item's (0, 0) coordinate, as returned by offset(). You can change the drawing offset by calling setOffset().

trans-unit.source: The pixmap should not receive any additional padding.

trans-unit.target: 占据ModernStyle页面标题背景的像素图

trans-unit.source: The place details are currently being fetched, no other operations may be performed until complete.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在获取该地详细信息,在完成之前不得进行其他操作。

trans-unit.source: The place details consist of properties of the place, such as the name, location, contact information and so on. When a place is returned during a search, these details are filled in. Sometimes in order to save bandwidth, there are further details about the place that can be retrieved on an individual place by place basis, if the user is interested. The QPlace::detailsFetched() function can be queried to see if all available details have been fetched, and if not, QPlaceManager::getPlaceDetails() can be used to retrieve them. Precisely which details are populated during a search and which need to be fetched individually may vary from provider to provider. See plugin documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 地点详细信息包括地点的属性，例如名称，位置，联系信息等。在搜索过程中返回位置时，将填写这些详细信息。有时，为了节省带宽，如果用户感兴趣，还会有关于该位置的更多详细信息，可以按位置逐个检索。该QPlace :: detailsFetched（）函数可以查询，看看是否所有可用的细节都被取出，如果不是，QPlaceManager :: getPlaceDetails（）可以用来检索。确切地说，在搜索过程中填充了哪些详细信息，以及需要分别获取的哪些细节可能因提供者而异。有关更多详细信息，请参见插件文档。

trans-unit.source: The place is currently being removed, no other operations can be performed until complete.
trans-unit.target: 目前该处正在拆除,在完成之前不能进行其他操作。

trans-unit.target: 目前正在保存该处,在保存完成之前不得进行其他操作。

trans-unit.source: The place is private to the current user. The place may be transferred to an online service but is only ever visible to the current user.

trans-unit.source: The place is public.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方是公共的。

trans-unit.source: The playback volume is scaled linearly, ranging from 0 (silence) to 100 (full volume). Values outside this range will be clamped.
trans-unit.target: 播放音量线性缩放，范围从 0 （静音）到 100 （最大音量）。超出此范围的值将被钳位。

trans-unit.source: The player has fully buffered the current media. The player is in the PlayingState or PausedState.
trans-unit.target: 播放器已完全缓冲当前媒体。玩家处于PlayingState或PausedState。

trans-unit.target: 播放器正在缓冲数据，但已缓冲了足够的数据以供回放以在不久的将来继续。玩家处于PlayingState或PausedState。

trans-unit.source: The player is expected to play QIODevice based streams. If passed to QMediaPlayer constructor, the service supporting streams playback will be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 播放器应播放基于QIODevice的流。如果传递给QMediaPlayer构造函数，则将选择支持流播放的服务。

trans-unit.source: The plot area does not include the area defined by margins. By default this will resize if inside a QChartView. If an explicit size is set for the plot area then it will respect this, to revert back to the default behavior, then calling setPlotArea(QRectF()); will achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 绘图区域不包括由边距定义的区域。默认情况下，如果在QChartView中，它将调整大小。如果为绘图区域设置了显式大小，则它将遵循此要求，以还原为默认行为，然后调用 setPlotArea(QRectF()); 。将实现这一目标。

trans-unit.source: The plot area does not include the area defined by margins. By default this will resize if inside a ChartView. If an explicit rectangle is set for the plot area then it will respect this, to revert back to the default behavior, then setting it to Qt.rect(0, 0, 0, 0) will achieve this.

trans-unit.source: The plugin does not necessarily require hardware acceleration. You can also use WARP, the Direct3D software rasterizer. By default, the first adapter providing hardware acceleration is chosen. To override this and use another graphics adapter or to force the use of the software rasterizer, set the QT_D3D_ADAPTER_INDEX environment variable to the index of the adapter. The adapters discovered are printed at startup when QSG_INFO or the qt.scenegraph.general logging category is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该插件不一定需要硬件加速。您还可以使用Direct3D软件光栅化程序WARP。默认情况下，选择第一个提供硬件加速的适配器。要覆盖此设置并使用另一个图形适配器，或者强制使用软件光栅化程序，请将 QT_D3D_ADAPTER_INDEX 环境变量设置为适配器的索引。启用 QSG_INFO 或 qt.scenegraph.general 日志记录类别时，将在启动时打印发现的适配器。

trans-unit.target: 该插件本身提供了一个支持多种输入法的输入框架,以及一个虚拟键盘的QML UI。输入框架可以通过插件接口进行扩展,允许在运行时加载第三方输入法和键盘布局。

The point is kept up-to-date when the DragHandler is actively responding to an EventPoint; but when the point is released, or the current point is being handled by a different handler, position.x and position.y are 0.

trans-unit.source: The point light can be described as a sphere, emitting light with equal strength in all directions from the center of the light. This is similar to the way a light bulb emits light.
The point size is by the QPointSize::value.

trans-unit.source: The point size is defined to match if it is within 20% of the requested point size. When several fonts match and are only distinguished by point size, the font with the closest point size to the one requested will be chosen.

trans-unit.source: The policies can be altered using the setHorizontalPolicy() and setVerticalPolicy() functions. Use the setHeightForWidth() function if the preferred height of the widget is dependent on the width of the widget (for example, a QLabel with line wrapping).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setHorizo​​ntalPolicy（）和setVerticalPolicy（）函数更改策略。如果小部件的首选高度取决于小部件的宽度（例如，带换行的QLabel），请使用setHeightForWidth（）函数。

trans-unit.source: The policy is Qt::TabFocus if the widget accepts keyboard focus by tabbing, Qt::ClickFocus if the widget accepts focus by clicking, Qt::StrongFocus if it accepts both, and Qt::NoFocus (the default) if it does not accept focus at all.
trans-unit.target: 该政策的Qt :: TabFocus如果部件由黏合接受键盘焦点，Qt的:: ClickFocus如果控件接受焦点通过点击，Qt的:: StrongFocus如果同时接受和Qt的:: NoFocus（默认值），如果它不完全接受焦点。

trans-unit.source: The polygon contains the four vertices of the rectangle in clockwise order starting and ending with the top-left vertex.
trans-unit.target: 多边形包含矩形的四个顶点,以顺时针方向开始,以左上角顶点结束。

trans-unit.source: The polygon is a convex polygon and can be drawn using specialized algorithms where available.
trans-unit.target: 多边形是一个凸多边形,在有条件的情况下可以用专门的算法来绘制。

trans-unit.source: The polygon is considered invalid if its path holds less than three coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 如果多边形的路径少于三个坐标,则视为无效。

trans-unit.source: The polygon is created by first converting all subpaths to polygons, then using a rewinding technique to make sure that overlapping subpaths can be filled using the correct fill rule.
trans-unit.target: 多边形的创建方法是首先将所有子路径转换为多边形,然后使用复卷技术确保重叠的子路径可以使用正确的填充规则进行填充。

trans-unit.source: The polygon is defined by an ordered list of QGeoCoordinates representing its perimeter.
trans-unit.target: 多边形由代表其周长的QGeoCoordinates的有序列表定义。

trans-unit.source: The polygon is specified as an array of alternating
trans-unit.target: 多边形被指定为一个交替的

trans-unit.source: The polygon should be drawn using OddEven fill rule.
trans-unit.target: 多边形应使用OddEven填充规则绘制。

trans-unit.source: The polygon should be drawn using Winding fill rule.
trans-unit.target: 多边形应采用缠绕填充规则绘制。

trans-unit.source: The popup can be opened or closed manually, if necessary:

trans-unit.source: The popup will close when the escape key is pressed while the popup has active focus.
trans-unit.target: 当弹出窗口有活动焦点时,按下逸出键,弹出窗口将关闭。

trans-unit.source: The popup will close when the mouse is pressed outside of it.

trans-unit.target: 当鼠标被释放到其父体之外时,弹出窗口将关闭。

trans-unit.source: The popup will only close when manually instructed to do so.
trans-unit.target: 只有当手动指示时,弹出窗口才会关闭。

trans-unit.source: The port and address of the connected peer is fetched by calling peerPort() and peerAddress(). peerName() returns the host name of the peer, as passed to connectToHost(). localPort() and localAddress() return the port and address of the local socket.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the control's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. For visualizing a slider, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 位置表示为控件大小的一部分，范围为 0.0 - 1.0 。为了可视化滑块，应改用从右到左的visualPosition。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the control's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. For visualizing a slider, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 位置表示为控件大小的一部分，范围为 0.0 - 1.0 。为了可视化滑块，应改用从右到左的visualPosition。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the control's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. For visualizing a slider, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 位置表示为控件大小的一部分，范围为 0.0 - 1.0 。为了可视化滑块，应改用从右到左的visualPosition。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the control's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. When the control is mirrored, the value is equal to 1.0 - position. This makes the value suitable for visualizing the slider, taking right-to-left support into account.
trans-unit.target: 位置表示为控件大小的一部分，范围为 0.0 - 1.0 。当控件被镜像时，该值等于 1.0 - position 。考虑到从右到左的支持，这使该值适合于可视化滑块。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the indicator's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. The position can be used for example to determine whether the thumb has been dragged past the halfway point. For visualizing a thumb indicator, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 的位置被表达为所述指示器的大小的一小部分，在范围 0.0 - 1.0 。该位置可用于例如确定拇指是否已拖动到中途点之外。为了可视化拇指指示器，应改用从右到左的visualPosition。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the indicator's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. The position can be used for example to determine whether the thumb has been dragged past the halfway point. For visualizing a thumb indicator, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 的位置被表达为所述指示器的大小的一小部分，在范围 0.0 - 1.0 。该位置可用于例如确定拇指是否已拖动到中途点之外。为了可视化拇指指示器，应改用从右到左的visualPosition。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the indicator's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. When the control is mirrored, the value is equal to 1.0 - position. This makes the value suitable for visualizing the thumb indicator taking right-to-left support into account. In order to for example determine whether the thumb has been dragged past the halfway point, the logical position should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 的位置被表达为所述指示器的大小的一小部分，在范围 0.0 - 1.0 。当控件被镜像时，该值等于 1.0 - position 。这使得该值适合于可视化拇指指示器，并考虑了从右到左的支持。例如，为了确定拇指是否已被拖过中点，应改为使用逻辑位置。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the indicator's size, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. When the control is mirrored, the value is equal to 1.0 - position. This makes the value suitable for visualizing the thumb indicator taking right-to-left support into account. In order to for example determine whether the thumb has been dragged past the halfway point, the logical position should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 的位置被表达为所述指示器的大小的一小部分，在范围 0.0 - 1.0 。当控件被镜像时，该值等于 1.0 - position 。这使得该值适合于可视化拇指指示器，并考虑了从右到左的支持。例如，为了确定拇指是否已被拖过中点，应改为使用逻辑位置。

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the value, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. For visualizing the progress, the right-to-left aware visualPosition should be used instead.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed as a fraction of the value, in the range 0.0 - 1.0. When the control is mirrored, visuaPosition is equal to 1.0 - position. This makes visualPosition suitable for visualizing the progress, taking right-to-left support into account.
trans-unit.target: 位置以值的分数表示，范围为 0.0 - 1.0 。当控件被镜像时， visuaPosition 等于 1.0 - position 。这使得 visualPosition 适合可视化的进展，以从右到左的支持考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the container and returns the iterator's prior value.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到容器中的下一项，并返回迭代器的先前值。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the hash and returns an iterator to the previous item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到哈希中的下一项，并将迭代器返回到上一项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the hash and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到哈希中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the map and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到映射中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the text block and returns an iterator to the old current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到文本块中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到旧的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (i++) advances the iterator to the next item in the text frame, and returns an iterator to the old item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ i++ ）将迭代器前进到文本框架中的下一项，然后将迭代器返回到旧项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (it++) advances the iterator to the next item in the container and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ it++ ）将迭代器前进到容器中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (it++) advances the iterator to the next item in the list and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ it++ ）将迭代器前进到列表中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (it++) advances the iterator to the next item in the set and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ it++ ）将迭代器前进到集合中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (it++) advances the iterator to the next result in the future and returns an iterator to the previously current result.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符（ it++ ）将迭代器前进到将来的下一个结果，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前结果。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator (it++) advances the iterator to the next matching item and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++操作符(it++)将迭代器推进到下一个匹配项,并返回到之前的当前项的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator, i++, advances the iterator to the next item in the map and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符 i++ 将迭代器前进到映射中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator, i++, advances the iterator to the next item in the object and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符 i++ 将迭代器前进到对象中的下一个项目，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The postfix ++ operator, it++, advances the iterator to the next item in the array and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀++运算符 it++ 将迭代器前进到数组中的下一项，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (i--) backs the iterator up to the previous item in the container and returns the iterator's prior value.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ i-- ）将迭代器备份到容器中的上一个项目，并返回迭代器的先前值。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (i--) makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator pointing to the previous item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ i-- ）使前一项成为当前项，并返回一个指向前一项的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (i--) makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator pointing to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ i-- ）使前一项成为当前项，并返回一个指向前一项的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (i--) makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator to the old current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ i-- ）使前一项成为当前项，并将迭代器返回到旧的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (i--) makes the preceding item in the current frame, and returns an iterator to the old item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ i-- ）在当前帧中创建前一项，然后将迭代器返回到旧项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (it--) makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ it-- ）使前一项成为当前项，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (it--) makes the preceding result current and returns an iterator to the previously current result.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符（ it-- ）使先前的结果成为当前结果，并将迭代器返回至先前的当前结果。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator (it--) makes the preceding matching item current and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀--操作符(it--)使前面的匹配项成为当前项,并返回一个迭代器到前面的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator, i--, makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator pointing to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符 i-- 使前一项成为当前项，并返回一个指向前一项的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The postfix -- operator, it--, makes the preceding item current and returns an iterator to the previously current item.
trans-unit.target: 后缀-运算符 it-- 使前一项成为当前项，并将迭代器返回到先前的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The pragma declaration must appear before any JavaScript code excluding comments.
trans-unit.target: pragma声明必须出现在任何JavaScript代码之前,不包括注释。

trans-unit.source: The precision cannot be a negative value. The default value is 6.

The preferred way to handle cleanup of graphics resources used in the scene graph, is to rely on the automatic cleanup of nodes. A QSGNode returned from QQuickItem::updatePaintNode() is automatically deleted on the right thread at the right time. Trees of QSGNode instances are managed through the use of QSGNode::OwnedByParent, which is set by default. So, for the majority of custom scene graph items, no extra work will be required.
trans-unit.target: 处理场景图中使用的图形资源的首选方法是依靠节点的自动清理。一个QSGNode从返回QQuickItem :: updatePaintNode（）在正确的时间正确的线程上被自动删除。QSGNode实例的树通过使用QSGNode :: OwnedByParent进行管理，默认情况下已设置。因此，对于大多数自定义场景图项目，将不需要额外的工作。

trans-unit.source: The presence of a NOTIFY signal does incur a small overhead. There are cases where a property's value is set at object construction time, and does not subsequently change. The most common case of this is when a type uses Grouped Properties, and the grouped property object is allocated once, and only freed when the object is deleted. In these cases, the CONSTANT attribute may be added to the property declaration instead of a NOTIFY signal.
trans-unit.target: NOTIFY信号的存在确实会产生少量开销。在某些情况下，属性值是在对象构造时设置的，并且随后不会更改。最常见的情况是，一种类型使用Grouped Properties，并且grouped属性对象分配了一次，并且仅在删除对象时才释放。在这些情况下，可以将CONSTANT属性而不是NOTIFY信号添加到属性声明中。

trans-unit.source: The presence of the CONSTANT attribute indicates that the property value is constant. For a given object instance, the READ method of a constant property must return the same value every time it is called. This constant value may be different for different instances of the object. A constant property cannot have a WRITE method or a NOTIFY signal.
trans-unit.target: CONSTANT 属性的存在指示该属性值是恒定的。对于给定的对象实例，常量属性的READ方法每次调用都必须返回相同的值。对于对象的不同实例，此常数值可能会有所不同。常量属性不能具有WRITE方法或NOTIFY信号。

trans-unit.source: The presence of the FINAL attribute indicates that the property will not be overridden by a derived class. This can be used for performance optimizations in some cases, but is not enforced by moc. Care must be taken never to override a FINAL property.
trans-unit.target: FINAL 属性的存在指示该属性将不会被派生类覆盖。在某些情况下，可以将其用于性能优化，但moc不会强制执行。绝对不要忽略 FINAL 属性。

trans-unit.source: The presence of the REQUIRED attribute indicates that the property should be set by a user of the class. This is not enforced by moc, and is mostly useful for classes exposed to QML. In QML, classes with REQUIRED properties cannot be instantiated unless all REQUIRED properties have been set.

trans-unit.source: The problem occurs because of the way the base state is defined for QML: as the "snapshot" state of the application just prior to entering an explicitly defined state. In this case, if we are in the process of animating from green back to red, and interrupt the animation to return to "GreenState", the base state will include the color in its intermediate, mid-animation form.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题的发生是由于QML定义基态的方式:作为应用程序在进入一个明确定义的状态之前的 "快照 "状态。在这种情况下,如果我们正处于从绿色回到红色的动画过程中,并中断动画以返回到 "GreenState",那么基态将包括中间的颜色,即动画的中间形式。

trans-unit.source: The problem with this pattern is that any failures in the test function will cause the call to item.destroy() to be skipped, leaving the item hanging around in the scene until the test case has finished. This can result in interference with future tests; for example, by blocking input events or producing unrelated debug output that makes it difficult to follow the code's execution.
trans-unit.target: 这种模式的问题在于，测试功能中的任何失败都将导致对 item.destroy() 的调用被跳过，从而使该项目一直挂在场景中，直到测试用例完成为止。这可能会干扰以后的测试；例如，通过阻止输入事件或产生不相关的调试输出，使跟踪代码执行变得困难。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating a new style begins by creating a new subdirectory for the style in a QML import path under the URL-based directory structure QtQuick/VirtualKeyboard/Styles/. See QML Import Path for information about QML import paths. The directory name can not contain spaces or special characters other than underscore. Also, the directory name can not be the same as one of the built-in style, which currently includes "default" and "retro".
trans-unit.target: 创建新样式的过程始于在基于URL的目录结构QtQuick / VirtualKeyboard / Styles / 下的QML导入路径中为样式创建新的子目录。有关QML导入路径的信息，请参见QML导入路径。目录名称不能包含空格或下划线以外的特殊字符。另外，目录名称不能与内置样式之一相同，后者目前包括“默认”和“复古”。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating a new style begins by creating a new subdirectory for the style in a QML import path under the URL-based directory structure QtQuick/VirtualKeyboard/Styles/. See QML Import Path for information about QML import paths. The directory name can not contain spaces or special characters other than underscore. Also, the directory name can not be the same as one of the built-in style, which currently includes "default" and "retro".

trans-unit.source: The process of sharing files via NFC involves other underlying communication transports such as Bluetooth or Wi-Fi Direct. It is implementation specific how and what type of transports are used to perform file transfer. The overall time taken to transfer content depends on the maximum speed of the transport used. Note that the process of sharing NDEF message/data does not require the use of other transports outside NFC.
trans-unit.target: 通过NFC共享文件的过程涉及其他基础通信传输,如蓝牙或Wi-Fi Direct。如何以及使用哪种类型的传输来执行文件传输取决于具体的实现。传输内容所需的总体时间取决于所使用的传输的最大速度。请注意,共享NDEF信息/数据的过程不需要使用NFC以外的其他传输。

trans-unit.source: The protocol is unknown.

trans-unit.source: The protocol name is an arbitrary string that indicates the type of connection being attempted. For example, it can match the scheme of a URL, like "http", "https" and "ftp". In most cases, the proxy selection will not change depending on the protocol, but this information is provided in case a better choice can be made, like choosing an caching HTTP proxy for HTTP-based connections, but a more powerful SOCKSv5 proxy for all others.
trans-unit.target: 协议名称是一个任意的字符串,表示正在尝试的连接类型。例如,它可以匹配URL的方案,如 "http"、"https "和 "ftp"。在大多数情况下,代理选择不会根据协议的不同而改变,但提供这些信息是为了万一可以做出更好的选择,比如为基于HTTP的连接选择一个缓存的HTTP代理,但为所有其他的连接选择一个更强大的SOCKSv5代理。

trans-unit.source: The protocol tag is an arbitrary string that indicates which protocol is being talked over the socket, such as "http", "xmpp", "telnet", etc. The protocol tag is used by the backend to return a request that is more specific to the protocol in question: for example, a HTTP connection could be use a caching HTTP proxy server, while all other connections use a more powerful SOCKSv5 proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 协议标签是一个任意的字符串,表示通过套接字谈的是哪个协议,比如 "http"、"xmpp"、"telnet "等。协议标签被后端用来返回一个更针对相关协议的请求:例如,一个HTTP连接可以使用一个缓存的HTTP代理服务器,而其他所有的连接则使用一个更强大的SOCKSv5代理服务器。

The purpose of QByteArrayList is quite different from that of QStringList. Whereas QStringList has many methods for manipulation of elements within the list, QByteArrayList does not. Normally, QStringList should be used whenever working with a list of printable strings. QByteArrayList should be used to handle and efficiently join large blobs of binary data, as when sequentially receiving serialized data through a QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: QByteArrayList的目的与QStringList完全不同。而QStringList中有列表中元素的操作方法很多，QByteArrayList没有。通常，每当使用可打印字符串列表时，都应使用QStringList。当通过QIODevice顺序接收序列化数据时，应使用QByteArrayList处理并有效地连接较大的二进制数据块。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of QReadLocker (and QWriteLocker) is to simplify QReadWriteLock locking and unlocking. Locking and unlocking statements or in exception handling code is error-prone and difficult to debug. QReadLocker can be used in such situations to ensure that the state of the lock is always well-defined.
trans-unit.target: QReadLocker（和QWriteLocker）的目的是简化QReadWriteLock的锁定和解锁。锁定和解锁语句或在异常处理代码中容易出错，并且难以调试。在此类情况下，可以使用QReadLocker来确保始终对锁的状态进行良好定义。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of QWriteLocker (and QReadLocker) is to simplify QReadWriteLock locking and unlocking. Locking and unlocking statements or in exception handling code is error-prone and difficult to debug. QWriteLocker can be used in such situations to ensure that the state of the lock is always well-defined.
trans-unit.target: QWriteLocker（和QReadLocker）的目的是简化QReadWriteLock锁定和解锁。锁定和解锁语句或在异常处理代码中容易出错，并且难以调试。在此类情况下，可以使用QWriteLocker来确保始终对锁的状态进行良好定义。

The purpose of QReadLocker (and QWriteLocker) is to simplify QReadWriteLock locking and unlocking. Locking and unlocking statements or in exception handling code is error-prone and difficult to debug. QReadLocker can be used in such situations to ensure that the state of the lock is always well-defined.

The purpose of QWriteLocker (and QReadLocker) is to simplify QReadWriteLock locking and unlocking. Locking and unlocking statements or in exception handling code is error-prone and difficult to debug. QWriteLocker can be used in such situations to ensure that the state of the lock is always well-defined.

The purpose of a QMutex is to protect an object, data structure or section of code so that only one thread can access it at a time (this is similar to the Java synchronized keyword). It is usually best to use a mutex with a QMutexLocker since this makes it easy to ensure that locking and unlocking are performed consistently.
trans-unit.target: QMutex的目的是保护对象，数据结构或代码段，以便一次只能有一个线程可以访问它（这类似于Java synchronized 关键字）。通常最好将互斥锁与QMutexLocker一起使用，因为这样可以轻松确保一致地执行锁定和解锁。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of a QMutex is to protect an object, data structure or section of code so that only one thread can access it at a time (this is similar to the Java synchronized keyword). It is usually best to use a mutex with a QMutexLocker since this makes it easy to ensure that locking and unlocking are performed consistently.
The purpose of an image response is to provide a way for image provider jobs to be executed in an asynchronous way.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of area monitoring is to inform a user when he/she comes close to an area of interest. In general such an area is described by a QGeoCircle. The circle's center represents the place of interest and the area around it identifies the geographical region within which notifications are sent.
trans-unit.target: 区域监视的目的是在用户接近感兴趣区域时通知他/她。通常，此区域由QGeoCircle描述。圆圈的中心表示感兴趣的地方，其周围的区域标识了要在其中发送通知的地理区域。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this property is to minimize resource use on platforms that use polling to update the state of the session. Applications can set the value of this property to the desired timeout before the session is closed. In response to the closed() signal the network session should be deleted to ensure that all polling is stopped. The session can then be recreated once it is required again. This property has no effect for sessions that do not require polling.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的目的是最大程度地减少使用轮询更新会话状态的平台上的资源使用。应用程序可以在关闭会话之前将此属性的值设置为所需的超时。响应closed（）信号，应删除网络会话，以确保停止所有轮询。一旦再次需要该会话，便可以重新创建该会话。此属性对不需要轮询的会话无效。

trans-unit.source: The push button is perhaps the most commonly used widget in any graphical user interface. Pushing (or clicking) a button commands the computer to perform some action or answer a question. Common examples of buttons are OK, Apply, Cancel, Close, Yes, No, and Help buttons.
trans-unit.target: 按钮可能是任何图形用户界面中最常用的部件。按下(或点击)按钮可以命令计算机执行一些操作或回答问题。按钮的常见例子有确定、应用、取消、关闭、是、否和帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: The push button, or command button, is perhaps the most commonly used widget in any graphical user interface. Push (click) a button to command the computer to perform some action, or to answer a question. Typical buttons are OK, Apply, Cancel, Close, Yes, No and Help.
trans-unit.target: 按钮,或命令按钮,可能是任何图形用户界面中最常用的部件。按下(点击)一个按钮来命令计算机执行一些操作,或者回答一个问题。典型的按钮有确定、应用、取消、关闭、是、否和帮助。

The query finds all the <p> elements in the file. For each <p> element, it builds a <p> element in the output containing the concatenated contents of all the <p> element's child <span> elements. Running the query through xmlpatterns might produce the following output, which is not sorted in the expected order.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在文件中找到所有 <p> 元素。对于每个 <p> 元素，它在输出中构建一个 <p> 元素，其中包含所有 <p> 元素的子 <span> 元素的串联内容。通过 xmlpatterns 运行查询可能会产生以下输出，该输出未按预期顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: The query is executed when the application calls one of the QXmlQuery evaluation functions. The application uses QXmlQuery::evaluateTo(QAbstractXmlReceiver *), because it then uses a serializer to out the query result as XML to stdout. We could have used QXmlQuery::evaluateTo(QXmlResultItems *) to get a list of result items, or QXmlQuery::evaluateTo(QStringList *) if the query evaluated to a sequence of xs:string values.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序调用QXmlQuery评估函数之一时，将执行查询。该应用程序使用QXmlQuery :: evaluateTo（QAbstractXmlReceiver *），因为它随后使用序列化器将查询结果作为XML stdout 到stdout。我们可以使用QXmlQuery :: evaluateTo（QXmlResultItems *）来获取结果项列表，或者如果查询评估为 xs:string 值序列，则可以使用QXmlQuery :: evaluateTo（QStringList *）。

trans-unit.source: The query may contain placeholders for binding values. Both Oracle style colon-name (e.g., :surname), and ODBC style (?) placeholders are supported; but they cannot be mixed in the same query. See the Detailed Description for examples.
trans-unit.target: 该查询可能包含用于绑定值的占位符。支持Oracle样式冒号（例如 :surname ）和ODBC样式（ ? ）占位符；但不能将它们混入同一查询中。有关示例，请参见详细说明。

trans-unit.source: The range of valid indexes for the QContiguousCache class are from 0 to INT_MAX. Calling prepend() such that the first index would become less than 0 or append() such that the last index would become greater than INT_MAX can result in the indexes of the cache being invalid. When the cache indexes are invalid it is important to call normalizeIndexes() before calling any of containsIndex(), firstIndex(), lastIndex(), at() or operator[](). Calling these functions when the cache has invalid indexes will result in undefined behavior. The indexes can be checked by using areIndexesValid()
trans-unit.target: QContiguousCache类的有效索引范围是从0到INT_MAX。调用prepend（）使得第一个索引小于0或append（）使得最后一个索引大于INT_MAX可能导致缓存的索引无效。当缓存索引无效时，在调用containsIndex（），firstIndex（），lastIndex（），at（）或operator []（）中的任何一个之前，先调用normalizeIndexes（）很重要。当缓存的索引无效时调用这些函数将导致未定义的行为。可以使用areIndexesValid检查索引（）

When the cache indexes are invalid it is important to call normalizeIndexes() before calling any of containsIndex(), firstIndex(), lastIndex(), at() or operator[](). Calling these functions when the cache has invalid indexes will result in undefined behavior. The indexes can be checked by using areIndexesValid()

The range of valid values for a QDateTimeEdit is controlled by the properties minimumDateTime, maximumDateTime, and their respective date and time components. By default, any date-time from the start of 100 CE to the end of 9999 CE is valid.

The range of values specified for the scroll bar are often determined differently to those for a QSlider because the length of the slider needs to be taken into account. If we have a document with 100 lines, and we can only show 20 lines in a widget, we may wish to construct a scroll bar with a page step of 20, a minimum value of 0, and a maximum value of 80. This would give us a scroll bar with five "pages".
trans-unit.target: 为滚动条指定的值范围通常与为QSlider确定的值范围不同，因为需要考虑滑块的长度。如果我们有一个包含100行的文档，并且在一个小部件中只能显示20行，则我们可能希望构造一个滚动条，其页面步长为20，最小值为0，最大值为80。给我们一个带有五个“页面”的滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The range of values that QDateTime can represent is dependent on the internal storage implementation. QDateTime is currently stored in a qint64 as a serial msecs value encoding the date and time. This restricts the date range to about +/- 292 million years, compared to the QDate range of +/- 2 billion years. Care must be taken when creating a QDateTime with extreme values that you do not overflow the storage. The exact range of supported values varies depending on the Qt::TimeSpec and time zone.
trans-unit.target: QDateTime可以表示的值的范围取决于内部存储的实现。QDateTime当前作为编码日期和时间的串行毫秒值存储在qint64中。与QDate范围的+/- 20亿年相比，这将日期范围限制为大约+/- 292百万年。创建具有不会导致存储溢出的极高值的QDateTime时，必须格外小心。支持值的确切范围取决于Qt :: TimeSpec和时区。

trans-unit.source: The range of values that QDateTime can represent is dependent on the internal storage implementation. QDateTime is currently stored in a qint64 as a serial msecs value encoding the date and time. This restricts the date range to about +/- 292 million years, compared to the QDate range of +/- 2 billion years. Care must be taken when creating a QDateTime with extreme values that you do not overflow the storage. The exact range of supported values varies depending on the Qt::TimeSpec and time zone.

trans-unit.source: The reading class provides access to sensor readings. The reading object is a volatile cache of the most recent sensor reading that has been received so the application should process readings immediately or save the values somewhere for later processing.
trans-unit.target: 阅读类提供对传感器读数的访问。读数对象是最近收到的传感器读数的易失性缓存,因此应用程序应立即处理读数,或将数值保存在某个地方以便以后处理。

trans-unit.source: The reading contains 3 values, measured in degrees per second that define the movement of the device around the x, y and z axes. Unlike QRotationReading, the values represent the current angular velocity rather than a fixed rotation. The measurements are in degrees per second.
trans-unit.target: 读数包含3个值（以每秒度数为单位），这些值定义了设备围绕x，y和z轴的移动。与QRotationReading不同，这些值表示当前角速度，而不是固定的旋转。测量单位为度/秒。

trans-unit.source: The reading values are automatically rotated based on the screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: 读数值会根据屏幕方向自动旋转。

trans-unit.source: The reading values are rotated based on the angle of the userOrientation property.
trans-unit.target: 读取值基于userOrientation属性的角度旋转。

trans-unit.target: 焦点更改的原因将是Qt :: OtherFocusReason。使用重载方法可以指定焦点原因，以便更好地处理焦点更改。

trans-unit.source: The reference configurations are run on the continuous integration (CI) system within Qt Project. In addition, they are subjected to unit test suite and other internal testing tools on a frequent basis (prior to new version releases, source tree branching, and at other significant period points in the development process). Errors or bugs discovered in these platforms are prioritized for correction. Significant errors discovered in tested configurations can impact release dates.
trans-unit.target: 参考配置在Qt项目中的持续集成(CI)系统上运行,此外,它们还经常接受单元测试套件和其他内部测试工具的测试(在新版本发布前,源树分支,以及其他重要的开发流程时期点)。此外,它们还经常接受单元测试套件和其他内部测试工具的测试(在新版本发布、源树分支和开发过程中的其他重要时期点之前)。在这些平台中发现的错误或bug会被优先纠正。在测试配置中发现的重大错误会影响发布日期。

The region of a frame that is actually displayed on a video surface is given by the viewport(). A stream may have a viewport less than the entire region of a frame to allow for videos smaller than the nearest optimal size of a video frame. trans-unit.source: The registry is already defined and hosting Sources.
trans-unit.target: 注册处已经定义并托管Sources。

trans-unit.source: The registry is tightly integrated with QtRO. Whenever a Source is added or removed, the name/URL is updated in the registry automatically. So once your node is connected to the registry, it is not necessary to connect to any other nodes manually. If you request an object on the network and you aren't connected to the hosting node, the registry will know what URL to connect to and will initiate the connection. Once connected (and the list of available objects is passed along, including the desired Source), the initialization process for the requested Replica will start automatically.
trans-unit.target: 该注册表与QtRO紧密集成。每当添加或删除源时，名称/ URL都会在注册表中自动更新。因此，一旦您的节点连接到注册表，就无需手动连接到任何其他节点。如果您请求网络上的对象，但未连接到托管节点，则注册表将知道要连接到的URL并启动连接。连接后（包括可用的Source在内的所有可用对象的列表将被传递），请求的副本服务器的初始化过程将自动开始。

trans-unit.source: The registry provides a simpler way to establish these connections. Every node that wants to be part of the registry's network connects to the registry. The registry is itself a specialized source object, and thus is hosted by a node. Connecting to the registry is simply a matter of passing the registry's URL to the QRemoteObjectNode or QRemoteObjectHost constructor, or passing the URL to the setRegistryUrl method.
trans-unit.target: 注册表提供了一种建立这些连接的简单方法。希望成为注册表网络一部分的每个节点都连接到注册表。注册表本身是专门的源对象，因此由节点托管。连接到注册表仅是将注册表的URL传递给QRemoteObjectNode或QRemoteObjectHost构造函数，或者将该URL传递给setRegistryUrl方法的问题。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression /^\}/ makes QDoc print until the first '}' character occurring at the beginning of the line without indentation. /.../ encloses the regular expression, and '^' means the beginning of the line. trans-unit.target: 正则表达式 /^\ } /使QDoc一直打印到行首没有缩进出现的第一个'}'字符为止。/.../包含正则表达式，“ ^”表示行的开头。必须将'}'字符转义，因为它是正则表达式中的特殊字符。

trans-unit.source: The remaining functions are qRound() and qRound64(), which both accept a double or float value as their argument returning the value rounded up to the nearest integer and 64-bit integer respectively, the qInstallMessageHandler() function which installs the given QtMessageHandler, and the qVersion() function which returns the version number of Qt at run-time as a string.
trans-unit.target: 剩下的函数是qRound（）和qRound64（），它们都接受 double 或 float 值作为其参数，分别返回四舍五入到最接近的整数和64位整数的值。qInstallMessageHandler（）函数将安装给定的QtMessageHandler，以及qVersion（）函数，该函数在运行时以字符串形式返回Qt的版本号。

trans-unit.source: The remaining macros are convenience macros for larger operations: The QT_TR_NOOP(), QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP(), and QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP3() macros provide the possibility of marking strings for delayed translation. QT_TR_N_NOOP(), QT_TRANSLATE_N_NOOP(), and QT_TRANSLATE_N_NOOP3() are numerator dependent variants of these. The Q_ASSERT() and Q_ASSERT_X() enables warning messages of various level of refinement. The Q_FOREACH() and foreach() macros implement Qt's foreach loop.
trans-unit.target: 其余的宏是用于较大操作的便捷宏：QT_TR_NOOP（），QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP（）和QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP3（）宏可为延迟翻译标记字符串。QT_TR_N_NOOP（），QT_TRANSLATE_N_NOOP（）和QT_TRANSLATE_N_NOOP3（）是这些分子的依赖变量。所述Q_ASSERT（）和Q_ASSERT_X（）允许在不同的电平的细化的警告消息。该Q_FOREACH（）和的foreach（）宏实现Qt的foreach循环。

trans-unit.target: 渲染过程被杀死，例如被 SIGKILL 或任务管理器杀死。

trans-unit.source: The render state contains a number of accessors that the shader needs to respect in order to conform to the current state of the scene graph.
trans-unit.target: 渲染状态包含了一些着色器需要尊重的访问器,以便符合场景图的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The render thread prepares to draw a new frame and initiates a block on the GUI thread.
The render thread prepares to draw a new frame and makes the OpenGL context current and initiates a block on the GUI thread.
trans-unit.target: 渲染线程准备绘制新的帧,并使OpenGL上下文成为当前帧,并在GUI线程上启动一个块。

trans-unit.source: The rendered frame is swapped and QQuickWindow::frameSwapped() is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 渲染的帧被交换并发出QQuickWindow :: frameSwapped（）。

trans-unit.source: The renderer generates states and records draw calls for the graphics API in use.
The renderer is implemented in a QVulkanWindowRenderer subclass, an instance of which is created in the createRenderer() factory function.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器在QVulkanWindowRenderer子类中实现，该子类的实例在createRenderer（）工厂函数中创建。

trans-unit.source: The renderer is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 渲染者不明。

trans-unit.source: The renderer lives in the gui/main thread, like the window itself. This thread is then throttled to the presentation rate, similarly to how OpenGL with a swap interval of 1 would behave. However, the renderer implementation is free to utilize multiple threads in any way it sees fit. The accessors like vulkanInstance(), currentCommandBuffer(), etc. can be called from any thread. The submission of the main command buffer, the queueing of present, and the building of the next frame do not start until frameReady() is invoked on the gui/main thread.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器位于gui /主线程中，就像窗口本身一样。然后将此线程限制为显示速率，类似于交换间隔为1的OpenGL的行为。但是，渲染器实现可以自由选择以其认为合适的方式利用多个线程。像存取vulkanInstance（），currentCommandBuffer（）等可以从任何线程调用。在gui / main线程上调用frameReady（）之前，主命令缓冲区的提交，当前队列的排队以及下一帧的构建都不会开始。

trans-unit.source: The renderer may lack support for certain minor features, such as drawing points and lines with a width other than 1.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器可能缺乏对某些次要功能的支持,例如绘制宽度大于1的点和线。

trans-unit.source: The renderer modifies the vertex shader returned from QSGMaterialShader::vertexShader() and compresses the z values of the vertex after the model-view and projection matrices have been applied and then adds a small translation on the z to position it the correct z position.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器修改了从QSGMaterialShader :: vertexShader（）返回的顶点着色器，并在应用了模型视图和投影矩阵后压缩了顶点的z值，然后在z上添加了一个小平移以将其放置在正确的z位置。

trans-unit.source: The renderer processes the nodes and calls OpenGL functions.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器处理节点并调用OpenGL函数。

trans-unit.source: The renderer processes the nodes.

The renderer separates between opaque primitives and primitives which require alpha blending. By using OpenGL's Z-buffer and giving each primitive a unique z position, the renderer can freely reorder opaque primitives without any regard for their location on screen and which other elements they overlap with. By looking at each primitive's material state, the renderer will create opaque batches. From Qt Quick core item set, this includes Rectangle items with opaque colors and fully opaque images, such as JPEGs or BMPs.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器将不透明基元和需要alpha混合的基元区分开来。通过使用 OpenGL 的 Z 缓冲区并为每个基元提供唯一的 Z 位置,渲染器可自由地重新排列不透明基元,而无需考虑其在屏幕上的位置以及与之重叠的其他元素。通过查看每个基元的材质状态,渲染器将创建不透明批次。从Qt Quick核心项集来看,这包括具有不透明颜色的矩形项和完全不透明的图像,如JPEG或BMP。

trans-unit.source: The rendering function can be changed with the renderFunction property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用renderFunction属性更改呈现功能。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of a QIcon object is handled by the QIconEngine class. Each icon has a corresponding icon engine that is responsible for drawing the icon with a requested size, mode and state.
trans-unit.target: QIconEngine对象的渲染由QIconEngine类处理。每个图标都有一个对应的图标引擎，该引擎负责以请求的大小，模式和状态绘制图标。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of the headers, weekdays or single days can be largely customized by setting QTextCharFormat's for some special weekday, a special date or for the rendering of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置QTextCharFormat的某些特殊的工作日，特殊的日期或标题的呈现，可以很大程度上自定义标题，工作日或单日的呈现。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of the hint is style and platform dependent. Widget styles can use the text information in the rendering for sections, or can choose to ignore it and render sections like simple separators.
trans-unit.target: 提示的渲染取决于样式和平台。小部件样式可以使用渲染中的文本信息来显示部分,也可以选择忽略它,像简单的分隔符一样显示部分。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of the hints is style and platform dependent. Widget styles can use the text and icon information in the rendering for sections, or can choose to ignore them and render sections like simple separators.
trans-unit.target: 提示的渲染取决于风格和平台。小部件样式可以在渲染中使用文本和图标信息来渲染部分,也可以选择忽略它们,像简单的分隔符一样渲染部分。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of the scene graph happens internally in the QQuickWindow class, and there is no public API to access it. There are, however, a few places in the rendering pipeline where the user can attach application code. This can be used to add custom scene graph content or render raw OpenGL content. The integration points are defined by the render loop.
trans-unit.target: 场景图的呈现发生在内部QQuickWindow类中，并且没有公共API可以访问它。但是，呈现管道中有一些地方可以让用户附加应用程序代码。这可用于添加自定义场景图内容或渲染原始OpenGL内容。积分点由渲染循环定义。

trans-unit.source: The rendering of the scene graph happens internally in the QQuickWindow class, and there is no public API to access it. There are, however, a few places in the rendering pipeline where the user can attach application code. This can be used to add custom scene graph content or to insert arbitrary rendering commands by directly calling the graphics API (OpenGL, Vulkan, Metal, etc.) that is in use by the scene graph. The integration points are defined by the render loop.

The rep file defines an interface, but interfaces often require external elements. In order to support this, repc will include any (single line) directives at the top of the generated files. This allows you to, for instance, use #include or #define directives that support the logic or datatypes needed.
trans-unit.target: rep文件定义了一个接口,但接口通常需要外部元素。为了支持这一点,repc会在生成的文件顶部包含任何(单行)指令。例如,这允许你使用#include或#define指令来支持所需的逻辑或数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The rep file format
trans-unit.target: 代表文件格式

trans-unit.source: The rep file format is a simple Domain Specific Language (DSL) for describing an interface supported over Qt Remote Objects (QtRO). Since QtRO is an object based system, these interfaces are defined by APIs available through objects, that is, classes with properties, signals, and slots.

The rep file format is a simple Domain Specific Language (DSL) for describing an interface supported over Qt Remote Objects (QtRO). Since QtRO is an object based system, these interfaces are defined by APIs available through objects, that is, classes with properties, signals, and slots.
trans-unit.target: rep文件格式是一种简单的域特定语言（DSL），用于描述Qt远程对象（QtRO）支持的接口。由于QtRO是基于对象的系统，因此这些接口是通过可通过对象（即具有属性，信号和插槽的类）获得的API定义的。

trans-unit.source: The repc tool currently ignores everything from the "#" symbol to the end-of-line and adds that to the generated files. So multi-line #if/#else/#endif statements and multi-line macros are not supported.
trans-unit.target: repc工具目前忽略了从 "#"符号到行末的所有内容,并将其添加到生成的文件中。所以不支持多行#if/#else/#endif语句和多行宏。

trans-unit.source: The request is an asynchronous operation so we need a slot to handle the completion of the request. In the handler we check that there are no errors and that our search result type is a place. If so we can then retrieve some of the core details of the place. At the end of the slot, we delete the reply since they are for single use only.
trans-unit.target: 该请求是一个异步操作,所以我们需要一个槽来处理请求的完成。在处理程序中,我们检查没有错误,并且我们的搜索结果类型是一个地方。如果是这样,我们就可以检索到这个地方的一些核心细节。在槽的最后,我们删除回复,因为它们只供单次使用。

The resource contains CSS.

trans-unit.source: The resource contains Markdown.

The resource contains image data. Currently supported data types are QVariant::Pixmap and QVariant::Image. If the corresponding variant is of type QVariant::ByteArray then Qt attempts to load the image using QImage::loadFromData. QVariant::Icon is currently not supported. The icon needs to be converted to one of the supported types first, for example using QIcon::pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 该资源包含图像数据。当前支持的数据类型是QVariant :: Pixmap和QVariant :: Image。如果相应的变体的类型为QVariant :: ByteArray，则Qt尝试使用QImage :: loadFromData加载图像。当前不支持QVariant :: Icon。首先需要将图标转换为支持的类型之一，例如，使用QIcon :: pixmap。

trans-unit.source: The resource files listed in the .qrc file are files that are part of the application's source tree. The specified paths are relative to the directory containing the .qrc file. Note that the listed resource files must be located in the same directory as the .qrc file, or one of its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: .qrc 文件中列出的资源文件是属于应用程序源树的一部分的文件。指定的路径是相对于包含 .qrc 文件的目录的。请注意，列出的资源文件必须与 .qrc 文件位于同一目录或其子目录之一。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the QOpenGLContext used by the scenegraph (on the render thread), when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
The resource is a pointer to the QVulkanInstance used by the scenegraph, when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
The resource is a pointer to the QRhi instance used by the scenegraph, when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
The resource is a pointer to the active QPainter used by the scenegraph, when running with the software backend.

The resource is a pointer to the command list or buffer used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkCommandBuffer * or MTLCommandBuffer *. This object has limited validity, and is only valid while the scene graph is preparing the next frame. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkCommandBuffer, not the handle itself.

The resource is a pointer to the currently active render command encoder object used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a MTLRenderCommandEncoder *. This object has limited validity, and is only valid while the scene graph is recording a render pass for the next frame. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
The resource is a pointer to the device context used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a ID3D11DeviceContext *. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.

The resource is a pointer to the graphics command queue used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkQueue * or MTLCommandQueue *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkQueue, not the handle itself.

The resource is a pointer to the graphics device, when applicable. For example, a VkDevice *, MTLDevice * or ID3D11Device *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkDevice, not the handle itself. This is because Vulkan handles may not be pointers, and may use a different size from the architecture's pointer size so merely casting to/from void * is wrong.

The resource is a pointer to the pysical device object used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkPhysicalDevice *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkPhysicalDevice, not the handle itself. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.

The resource is a pointer to the render pass used by the scenegraph, describing the color and depth/stecil attachments and how they are used. For example, a VkRenderPass *. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
The resource system is based on tight cooperation between qmake, rcc (Qt's resource compiler), and QFile.
trans-unit.target: 资源系统基于qmake，rcc（Qt的资源编译器）和QFile之间的紧密合作。

trans-unit.source: The resources associated with an application are specified in a .qrc file, an XML-based file format that lists files on the disk and optionally assigns them a resource name that the application must use to access the resource.

trans-unit.source: The returned image will normally have the same {Image Formats}{format} as the original image. However, a complex transformation may result in an image where not all pixels are covered by the transformed pixels of the original image. In such cases, those background pixels will be assigned a transparent color value, and the transformed image will be given a format with an alpha channel, even if the orginal image did not have that.
trans-unit.target: 返回的图像通常与原始图像具有相同的{图像格式}{格式}。但是,复杂的变换可能会导致图像中并非所有的像素都被原始图像的变换像素所覆盖。在这种情况下,这些背景像素将被赋予一个透明的颜色值,而变换后的图像将被赋予一个alpha的格式。在这种情况下,这些背景像素将被分配一个透明的颜色值,并且转换后的图像将被赋予一个带有alpha通道的格式,即使原始图像没有这个通道。

trans-unit.source: The returned interface may change as a result of a roaming process.
trans-unit.target: 返回的接口可能会因为漫游过程而改变。

trans-unit.source: The returned line has no trailing end-of-line characters ("\n" or "\r\n"), so calling QString::trimmed() can be unnecessary.

trans-unit.source: The returned list does not contain the states of possible nested state machines.

trans-unit.source: The returned list is empty if this service instance's discoverDetails() was not yet called or there are no known characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未调用此服务实例的discoverDetails（）或没有已知特征，则返回的列表为空。

trans-unit.source: The returned list is in order of frequency of usage, i.e. larger zones within a country are listed first.
trans-unit.target: 返回的列表是按照使用频率的顺序排列的,即一个国家内较大的区段首先列出。

trans-unit.source: The returned list is sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 返回的列表是按字母顺序排列的。

trans-unit.target: 返回的内存类型将是主机可见的,也是连贯的。此外,如果可能的话,它还将被缓存。
